thread.title: Aliens on the MOON: Top scientist claims oxygen moved from Earth shows life
thread.title_full: Aliens on the MOON: Top scientist claims oxygen moved from Earth shows life

title: Aliens on the MOON: Top scientist claims oxygen moved from Earth shows life
text:
LIFE ON MOON? Top researchers discovered the Moon is showered in oxygen ions 
NASA believes aliens would need liquid water, energy and organic material to live like mankind. 
Life on the Moon was ruled impossible because of its barren state – until now, science boffins claim. 
Top researchers discovered the Moon is showered in oxygen ions blasted from Earth during a five-day period each month. 
Solar winds coated the Moon in oxygen ions when it passes the Earth's magnetic shield. 13 signs of alien life Tuesday, 15th November 2016 Daily Star Pictures brings you 13 mind-blowing signs that aliens exist. 1 / 13 More than 40,000 Americans have taken out insurance against being abducted by aliens. 
GETTY SECRET: NASA believes aliens would need water and organic material to live “Earth's upper atmosphere consists of oxygen ions that are easily picked up by the solar wind and transported to the Moon” Terada 
Astrophysicist Kentaro Terada, from Osaka University in Japan, told EOS: "Our new finding suggests that the Earth-Moon system co-evolves not only physically but also chemically.” 
When lunar rocks were studied in 2006, the oxygen levels were not consistent with the needs of life. 
But now scientists propose oxygen ions from Earth could explain the chemical imbalance. 
Terada told the Atlantic: "Earth's upper atmosphere consists of oxygen ions that are easily picked up by the solar wind and transported to the Moon. 
GETTY REVEALED: Oxygen levels were not consistent with the needs of life in 2006 
"Maybe some portion is implanted on the Moon, and some portion is lost into interplanetary space." 
This comes as top scientists revealed dark streaks in the clouds could suggest life on Venus . Related articles
